attributes.action: Owners showing Dogs Must Prove How they Afford to Attend Dog Shows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog showing is more about human social standing, the best dog does not win. Owners should NOT be permitted to breed in order to attend dog shows as that is clearly an undeclared income.
Owners delude themselves into saying its non profit making, RUBBISH, many owners charge upwards of £1600 for progeny. Many are retired, single parents and the unemployed . When will this be STOPPED.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
